title: fix: disable filter_pushdown for unimplemented AddSelectFilters
description: scanner_odp_read.cpp:136 sets filter_pushdown=true but AddSelectFilters is not implemented. DuckDB pushes WHERE clauses which hits NotImplementedException. Fixed to filter_pushdown=false so DuckDB handles WHERE filtering post-scan.

title: fix: BW preview returns 0 columns in sap_odp_preview
description:
sap_odp_preview('BW', ...) produces an empty result (0 columns) because BW extractors return empty ET_FIELDS from RODPS_REPL_ODP_GET_DETAIL. With 0 fields, DuckDB gets 0 column names and 0 column types â€” a silent, confusing failure.

Fixed by adding an empty-fields guard that throws InvalidInputException with a descriptive message guiding users to use sap_odp_read_full instead for BW extractors.
close_reason: Fixed: added empty-fields guard with descriptive error message

title: fix: null dereference in HasMoreResults when _xml_is is nullptr
description: odp_fetch.cpp:510 accesses _xml_is->str() without null check. If LoadFromSAP fails or SAP returns empty response, _xml_is remains nullptr causing crash. Fixed with null guard.

title: fix: throw new leaks memory in AddSelectFilters
description: odp_fetch.cpp:238 uses 'throw new NotImplementedException' which heap-allocates the exception, causing memory leak and undefined exception handling. Fixed to 'throw NotImplementedException'.

title: fix: FILTERS parameter crashes in sap_odp_read_full
description:
The FILTERS named parameter in sap_odp_read_full crashes with an assertion failure due to three issues in odp/src/odp_fetch.cpp:

1. SIGN and OP fields use ENUM types that can't accept VARCHAR struct literals from user SQL
2. CreateFieldSelections() returns _select_filters (raw user input) instead of ret (rebuilt RFC-compatible values)  
3. The SIGN enum was incorrectly named 'OP' instead of 'SIGN'

Fixed by simplifying SIGN/OP types to VARCHAR (SAP validates server-side) and correcting the return variable.
close_reason: Fixed: simplified SIGN/OP types to VARCHAR, corrected return variable in CreateFieldSelections()
